description: Details of construction method statement pursuant to condition 8 of planning permission reference PP/2015/5710 dated 23/05/2016 for "Conversion of single family dwellinghouse into nine self-contained flats (5 x 2 bed and 4 x 1 bed); extensions to the building including - enlargement of basement level and creation of sunken patio gardens; part single, part two storey rear extension; part single, part two storey side extension; rear roof extension (involving the enlargement of habitable roofspace) including over the proposed two storey side extension; installation of two rooflights to front roofslope; alteration of windows and doors in all elevations; balconies/roof terraces at upper-ground, first and second floor levels; provision of 2 no. off street parking spaces; provision of refuse and cycle storage facilities; associated landscaping of property".
